review: I bought this as a gift for a friend and set it up.  This is almost easy to use.  The software or interface needs a little bit more simplification.  I also had a hard time switching accounts from mine to my friends.
author: Vincent R.

review: We can send a robot to Pluto... but you can't watch NASA TV on a Fire Stick.  The "unofficial" NASA app doesn't work -- it freezes 60 seconds into the video stream.  Can't watch Youtube, either.  The Youtube app is absurdly, unusably, laughably slow.  There's no internet browser unless you sideload.  Ever since this product came out, I've been waiting for Amazon to improve the app selection.  And there has been no improvement.  The apps are garbage.  The Fire Stick does an ok job at streaming Prime Video if that's the only thing you ever want to watch, but if you were hoping to get video from other sources, forget about it.
